name: Old Love: Story
storyline:
Old Love: Story is an interactive storytelling and adventure game based on a unique and romantic love story about an old man Tom who lives alone and sad since the death of his wife Lea, but one day he had the chance to get back in time to three years, to the day of his wife's death to make her the happiest elderly woman in Oldland, to change the events of that day and be with her until the last breath before she leaves again. 
 
Old Love is a marvelous romantic story, a mixture of pure love, welfare and also sadness.. it makes us think again about our relationship with the elderly. 
 
Features: 
 
♢ Great experience based on a unique romance love story. 
♢ Simple and effective gameplay. 
♢ Cute graphics. 
♢ Calm music and a range of excellent sound effects make the experience even more beautiful. 
♢ Multiple languages.
